General.Name: Puravankara Limited
General.Description: Puravankara Limited, together with its subsidiaries, develops residential and commercial properties in India and internationally. The company develops affordable homes, as well as amenities and facilities. It markets its projects under the Purvaland, Puravankara, and Provident brand names. The company was formerly known as Puravankara Projects Limited and changed its name to Puravankara Limited in December 2016. Puravankara Limited was founded in 1975 and is headquartered in Bengaluru, India.
